Room.Name: Lost in the Respitial Sea
Room.ShortDescription: You are floating on the waves of a vast sea, hopelessly lost.
Room.LongDescription: This is the type of weather that makes the weather wizards in Oceancrest very happy. It gives them a chance to watch their apprentices practice their magic their skills. It also lets them do a little showing off to fellow wizards. Anyway, you might expect the weather to change drastically any minute now. Maybe you ought to quit playing around and find land.
